result.eng: Because of the amount of information available.
result.ga: de bharr an méid eolais atá le fáil
result.orig: de bharr an méid eolais atá le fáil
result.html: de bharr an méid eolais atá le fáilBecause of the amount of information available.
result.ponchtml: de ḃarr an méid eolais atá le fáilBecause of the amount of information available.

result.eng: Half of that amount would do.
result.ga: dhéanfadh leath an méid sin cúis
result.orig: dhéanfadh leath an méid sin cúis
result.html: dhéanfadh leath an méid sin cúisHalf of that amount would do.
result.ponchtml: ḋéanfaḋ leaṫ an méid sin cúisHalf of that amount would do.

result.eng: Instead of gathering sense, what he's doing is losing whatever amount he had.
result.ga: in áit a bheith ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleadh cibé a bhí aige
result.orig: in áit a bheith ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleadh cibé a bhí aige
result.html: in áit a bheith ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleadh cibé a bhí aigeInstead of gathering sense, what he's doing is losing whatever amount he had.
result.ponchtml: in áit a ḃeiṫ ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleaḋ cibé a ḃí aigeInstead of gathering sense, what he's doing is losing whatever amount he had.
